overview: Given that a man reaches his physical peak in his late teens, is it any wonder that lots of older guys love to partake in a bit of fresh-faced bounty? After all, who wouldn’t want to enjoy the pleasures that only the hardest, freshest dicks can provide? Fortunately for these “dads”, there’s more than enough lads who get off on the flip-side to all this, and who love the maturity that only extra years can give. The result is this fabulous array of inter-generational filth, culminating in one horny daddy getting double-fisted by the cute Mendez twins. Has getting older ever looked so fucking debauched?!
title: Dads Do Lads
